The food is convienent. The food has no flavor. Dining around town is nice.

Small setting makes class size nice. Schedules are flexible. Academic demands are reasonable.
this is a nice small college. It is friendly. It offers something for everyone.
I really enjoy attending WCJC. It is a great small college that offers something for everyone. I am on the Rodeo Team and have a lot of suppport from friends and the coaches.

textAfterTable: In three sentences this junior college is a wonderful experience for students who are just coming from high school or people who are wishing to continue there education. the environment gives you a feel of being in a main college campus classroom, but the ability to talk to the teacher one on one if you are struggling. they also offer wonderful services to help tutor students who are struggling with several classes free of cost, providing an excellent service of help if a student needs it. Login to rate or flag the reviews Khyati from Wharton, TX 08/30/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 34 Categories Comments Food and Dining The meal plan takes the pressure off having to forage for food, giving students more time to study.
